website_summaries.verdict: This swing set has three swing positions and two levels on the elevated play deck.
pros: A nice large size and good quality on the set
Does not require quite as much depth as some other Backyard Discovery sets
cons: Like other swing sets by the brand, it takes a little time to put together

customer_reviews.title: Great set. $1,000 cheaper then local dealer and bigger!!
customer_reviews.text: Me and my father built this set in about 12 hours. So 1 1/2 days 2 men. All the hardware and wood is good quality and the set looks great. Instructions are well done. Pay attention to hole alignments and you will not have an issue. Only 2 or 3 boards split a touch. No issue. Kid loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Tudico

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: Assembled in two days time. I love cedar wood because of its weather durability and appearance, but it’s not the strongest wood and larger people should take caution. The slide comes in two pieces and when even the smallest of my kids goes down it I can see it bend in the middle where it was connected. My biggest complaint is the slide and how close the swings are to each other.. The kids bang into each other when swinging. It’s a pretty cute set though and perfect for my kids at this age. They will likely outgrow it around the age 8-10.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Estabrook

customer_reviews.title: Great swingset
customer_reviews.text: The kids love it. The only 2 things I’d change are adding more space between swings and making the slide less bumpy (the support rod under the slide popped out few times when a bigger kid went down. But overall it’s a great set for the value. The guy assembling it said that more parts used to come pre-assembled (like the platforms) but now the manufacturer assembles less parts since they are incurring shipping expenses (ships at no cost). Not sure how true that is but took him about 16 hours with a helper.
customer_reviews.author: Lo

customer_reviews.title: Finally got it put up since we got clear weather ...
customer_reviews.text: Finally got it put up since we got clear weather but my daughter loves it. It probably took About a total of 16-18 he's bc we had to stop and then wait for the weather to clear.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: Tentative review, will update once the build is completed. My slide came damaged, as well as several important to the frame boards came split on the ends. The company is super pleasant to deal with, and we are waiting on replacement parts to finish up. No muss or fuss, just what is damaged, we’ll get those parts right out to you! Super impressed with the customer service. This thing is a beast, lots of parts and lots of steps, but we are excited to get it finished!
customer_reviews.author: MomCMAHJ

customer_reviews.title: There is nothing to dislike with this product directions easy to follow all parts ...
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing to dislike with this product directions easy to follow all parts clearly marked just need to allow the time to construct when the lids are sleeping would recommend to others which i have
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: The swing set is super fun. We especially love the swings. The climbing wall and slide with the bumps are a little dangerous for 2 years and below. We stained ours every year but unfortunately some of the wood is peeling up a little bit. A bit disappointing for the price and the time that went in to setting it up. My husband is good with his hands (a mason) and it took him 16-18 hours to put together by himself.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces. Time consuming.
customer_reviews.text: Boxes came on a pallet, banded together and all boxes were taped closed. Upon assembly I've found several pieces missing, so much so that I've had to call backyard discovery on 3 occasions to let them know. Several brackets, shackles, and one of the roof panels are missing so far. Its comical because at the end of each conversation they ask "is that all" as if this is common, so I asked if it was, and was told it was not. Its irritating that a set, that takes ample amount of time to assemble is missing so many pieces. Especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s built
customer_reviews.text: No missing parts. Went together alright, one board split. Took a bit longer than we expected, but two skilled mechanical people it would probably be done in 10 hours. Helps to sort all the pieces when you open the box. Follow the steps in the manual.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Lenhart

customer_reviews.title: Never again
customer_reviews.text: Pieces came in chipped. It’s been over a year now and many pieces are falling apart and breaking.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Cardinale

customer_reviews.title: It’s great fun for the kids
customer_reviews.text: It was very easy to assemble, took 4 guys 7 hours to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: The kids love it
customer_reviews.text: Great play set! I put it together in about 2 weekends. Easy to follow instructions, just pay attention to the predrilled holes and which direction they need to go. Lots of tedious steps. Looks good! The kids love it.
customer_reviews.author: jskee25

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: We are really enjoying it! It’s fun and attractive in our yard.
customer_reviews.author: Breeviola

customer_reviews.title: Great value, well-made – hard to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This thing takes days to put together, but it is a great value. Three kids love it every day and it holds up nicely to their use.
customer_reviews.author: Jed Bludworth

customer_reviews.title: Takes time.
customer_reviews.text: Put it together in one weekend. Everything was labeled and went together just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Louie Nicolard

customer_reviews.title: Very nice.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set. Took my husband and a friend about 12 hours to put it together so it's quite the task. And some of the wood split despite using the right tools. But...it's sturdy and my girls love it. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: aheckman1015

customer_reviews.title: Very cool playset. Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Very cool playset. Good quality. All hardware included. It took me 2 full days to put this thing together. I had some help one of the days. The directions were ok, I would have done things in a little bit different order. Some of the pre-drilled holes were missing, not a real big deal. For the most part well thought out. I would like to see better anchors for the ground, they are ok, but not great. Living in Florida I want to secure this thing to the ground a little better. Having 2 drills would be handy as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Backyard Discovery Pacific View All Cedar Wood Playset Swing Set
product_meta.description: The Pacific View cedar wood swing set has an awesome upper clubhouse with second level sun porch. Down below there is a two-level play deck / sand box and a half picnic table. A standard ladder and solid rock wall allow climbing to be both easy and challenging. The 10' speedy slide is fast and fun! This play set has two belt swings and a two-person glider so four can swing at once. Made from 100% cedar wood that is pre-cut, pre-drilled, and pre-stained for ease of assembly. Dimensions with slide out front: 17' 7" W x 13' 5" D x 9' 6" H
feature_bullets: A wooden swing set including both a backyard fort and a playhouse, with 2 belt swings and a glider swing, with a slide and a sand box
Raised backyard clubhouse with a sun porch at a higher level for this garden swing set
Lower fort with wooden sandbox area and picnic table included in this swing set for children
Two standard belt swings and a swing set glider . A 10 foot playground slide - super safe but speedy
Playset hardware includes a standard playset ladder. A challenging solid rock climbing wall for kids. Sand required: 6 cu ft

Engineered to meet or exceed ASTM standards (code F1148-19). This product is intended for RESIDENTIAL USE ONLY. Any use of this product outside of a residential setting will make the product null and void.
3D interactive assembly instructions for this product are available through the free BILT app.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars35 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
specifications.Manufacturer: Backyard Discovery- Leisure Time Products, Inc. - Dropship
